#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Be
#Text=Human ( Philosophy )
#Text=Being human is a lot more complicated than just surviving long enough to reproduce .
#Text=We all seek a purpose in life and hope to thrive .
#Text=This will show you step by step what you have to do to be human .
#Text=These steps/parts do n’t need to be followed in any particular order ( with the exception of part 0 being first ) . *Written for a school project*
#Text=Steps
#Text=Sustain Long Term Survival And Security
#Text=Before you worry about the semantics of the human condition , make sure you can take care of your physical and safety needs first .
#Text=These requirements are the first two levels of Maslov ’s Hierarchy of Needs , which is another important aspect in being human .
#Text=You need to make sure you are able to get sufficient daily nutrients and water , along with appropriate shelter for you environment .
#Text=Once you physical needs are taken care of you need to make sure you are as safe as possible .
#Text=Living in an area plagued with crime or war will jeopardize your survival , so it ’s important to live in a safe and stable place .
#Text=Establish A Sense
#Text=Of Self
#Text=Begin to worry about being not just another animal , but a human being .
#Text=And to be a human you need to have an identity .
#Text=Being human is a lot more than just being another member of a group of animals working together for survival , it ’s about being your own individual person .
#Text=Figuring out exactly who you are can be tricky though , and is often something that takes a long time .
#Text=It is important not to rush in deciding who you are .
#Text=Always remember that people can change , it ’s very likely you will be a different person at different times in your life and that ’s okay .
#Text=The step below outline how you can go about finding out who you are
#Text=Figure out what you like and potentially what you want to do with your life .
#Text=Find something your passionate about and ask if it ’s something you could gear your life towards .
#Text=Spend time reading and explore different environments to see what you like .
#Text=For example , if you know you love food and preparing food , maybe consider taking some cooking classes , and if you ’re still young , consider studying culinary arts after high school .
#Text=Travel .
#Text=Travel is very important in developing a sense of self because it exposes you to a large variety of cultures and environments .
#Text=After seeing different cultures and areas , you can decide where you think you belong .
#Text=Maybe a certain country would be a more appropriate place for you to live in than the one you currently reside in .
#Text=Find role models .
#Text=It ’s hard to figure out who you want to be from scratch , having role models can help you to understand who you might want to be .
#Text=Develop Relationships
#Text=Relationships are incredibly important and one of the most fundamental parts of the human experience .
#Text=No Man is an island , it ’s important to have people you can trust and have fun with .
#Text=Find like-minded people who share your interests .
#Text=One of the best ways to start a friendship is to find something to do together .
#Text=This allows for bonding and can make an activity a lot more enjoyable .
#Text=A good way to meet people with similar interests is to join a club or sports team .
#Text=Develop strong relationships with your family .
#Text=Your family is a good place to develop lasting relationships since most people are very close with their families and live with them .
#Text=Find something you like to do or something you like to talk about with someone in your family .
#Text=For example , if your grandfather likes to play the same kinds of board games you do , set some time aside to create a game night .
#Text=Find love and consider starting a family .
#Text=Friends and family are great , but it ’s also important to have someone in your life that you love romantically and can share your life with .
#Text=Love is a very important part of the human experience , and people who are married often have benefits that other people do not .
#Text=Find Your Purpose
#Text=In Life
#Text=Finding purpose can be a difficult thing to do , especially when there ’s the possibility that we live in a purposeless world .
#Text=It ’s important to find a reason for your existence , and something that fulfills you as a person .
#Text=Think about how you want to be remembered .
#Text=A good way to figure out what your purpose should be is to think about how people will view what you ’ve done after you ’ve died .
#Text=This will give you an idea of what you should gear your life towards .

#Text=For example , if you think the most important thing you could do for society is to contribute to scientific understanding , then find some way to work in a setting devoted towards scientific progress .
#Text=Find something that ’s fulfilling and enjoyable .
#Text=Everyone does n’t need to be or aspire to be the man who cures cancer , or solves world hunger , your purpose can be found in what you love to do .
#Text=For example , if you love computers and video games maybe consider making a blog or writing reviews .
#Text=_
